title: Add two numbers
text: Write a function add(a, b) that returns the sum of a and b.

title: Is palindrome
text: Given a string s, return True if s is a palindrome, otherwise False.

title: Factorial
text: Write a function factorial(n) that returns n! for n >= 0.

title: Fibonacci
text: Write a function fib(n) that returns the nth Fibonacci number (0-indexed).

title: Reverse words
text: Given a string, return the string with the words reversed, preserving spacing.

title: Sum of squares
text: Return the sum of squares of numbers in a list.

title: List flatten
text: Flatten a nested list into a single list of elements.

title: Count vowels
text: Count the vowels in a given string (case-insensitive).

title: Find max pair
text: Return the pair of numbers in a list whose product is maximum.

title: Remove duplicates
text: Remove duplicates from a list while preserving order.
